function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased risk of spreading contagious diseases through shared transportation modes","Impact":"Potential for widespread transmission of contagious diseases among users of shared vehicles and public transit","Mitigation":"Investment in regular hygiene and vehicle cleaning, development of robust health and safety protocols, promotion of personal hygiene practices among users","Technologies":"Hygiene monitoring and tracking technologies, contactless payment systems, air purification systems for vehicles","People":"Users of shared vehicles and public transit","Owner":"Transportation service providers, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Disputes over space and competition for infrastructure among pedestrians, micro-mobility devices, and motorized vehicles","Impact":"Conflict and safety issues arising from the limited space available for different modes of transport in urban areas","Mitigation":"Redesign of streets and infrastructure to accommodate a diverse range of transportation modes, promotion of shared space principles, implementation of traffic management measures","Technologies":"Smart city planning and design technologies, traffic flow monitoring systems, urban mobility modeling tools","People":"Pedestrians, micro-mobility device users, drivers, city planners","Owner":"City authorities, urban planners, transportation agencies"},{"Description":"Economic challenges for sharing models and service providers due to hygiene concerns and additional costs","Impact":"Financial strain on sharing service providers, potential increase in costs for users, reduced availability of sharing options","Mitigation":"Development of cost-effective hygiene and cleaning solutions, investment in technology for contactless operations, partnerships with public health organizations for hygiene standards","Technologies":"Hygiene monitoring and cleaning technologies, contactless operation systems, data analytics for demand forecasting","People":"Sharing service providers, users of sharing services","Owner":"Sharing service companies, public health organizations"}]}
